headline: LAZYDAYS COMPLETES LIQUIDITY ENHANCING TRANSACTIONS
summary: Lazydays Holdings, Inc. ("Lazydays" or the "Company") (NasdaqCM: GORV) today announced that it has executed amendments and waivers with its credit facility lender syndicate led by M&T Bank and its mortgage lender, an affiliate of Coliseum Capital Management, that will help to enhance the Company's liquidity position and further fortify its financial foundation.
